Loading Packages
```{r load packages, warning = FALSE}
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
```

Exercise 1.1
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == 'Denmark' | country == 'Greece' | country == 'Nepal',
         year ==  1972)
```
Exercise 1.2
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == 'Denmark' | country == 'Greece' | country == 'Nepal',
         year ==  1972) %>%
  select(country, gdpPercap)
```

Exercise 1.3
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  mutate(LifeExpDiff = lifeExp - lag(lifeExp)) %>%
  filter(LifeExpDiff < 0)
```
